overview_of_class: This is the second course in the upper level econometrics sequence. Topics covered will include control variables, panel data, instrumental variables, difference-in-differences and regression discontinuity designs.
name: Econometrics
title: WCAS ECON 381-2-20 Econometrics

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This is the second course in the upper level econometrics sequence. Topics covered will include control variables, panel data, instrumental variables, difference-in-differences and regression discontinuity designs.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Econ 310-1 and Econ 381-1 (Econ 310-2, 311 recommended); Math 230, 234, 240 and 314

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Two lectures per week (plus a discussion section on Fridays depending on enrollment)

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Problem sets (25%), a midterm (35%) and a final (40%).

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Stock and Watson: Introduction to Econometrics, 3rd Edition (ISBN: 978-0138009007)

subject: ECON
